textAfterTable: 35     Usual syntax:  36       i2cdump 0 0x4c b  37     Here the '0' stands for the bus number (run i2cdump with no arguments   38     to list all installed busses).  39     '0x49' is the device address, and 'b' or 'w' stands for byte  40     or word data.  41     42   * prog/dump/i2cset (written in C, installed by 'make install')  43     prog/dump/i2cget (written in C, installed by 'make install')  44     These programs are used to write to or read from a register of an  45     I2C device. Usual syntax:  46       i2cset bus device address data  47       i2cget bus device address  48 25   49 26 * prog/dump/isadump (written in C, installed by 'make install')  lm-sensors/branches/lm-sensors-3.0.0/prog/detect/Module.mk r2604
